text: The France national under-17 football team represents France in youth international football completions such as FIFA U-17 World Cup and the UEFA European Under-17 Championship. They won the 2001 FIFA U-17 World Championship. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-17 World Cup record=== Year Result GP W D* L GS GA 1985 did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify
